items.title: Another Jeju Air jet has landing-gear issue, returns safely
items.description: A Jeju Air Co. jet suffered a landing-gear malfunction on Monday, a day after 179 people died in the country’s worst civil-aviation disaster.

items.title: Walmart dominated, while Target spiraled: the winners and losers of retail in 2024
items.description: Starbucks had a tough year. Orders are getting increasingly complex, and that's led to long lines and incorrect pickup times.

items.title: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway is buying up shares of a lagging 1990s dot-com darling
items.description: Berkshire invested $74 million in domain name and internet infrastructure company VeriSign this month.

items.title: Elon Musk eyes a deal with his native South Africa to let SpaceX offer Starlink service in exchange for a Tesla battery plant, report says
items.description: Musk’s political influence continues to grow.

items.title: Elon Musk channels Hillary Clinton in calling Trump supporters ‘contemptible fools’ amid H-1B visa debate
items.description: Musk suggested MAGA hardliners "must be removed from the Republican Party, root and stem.”
